item.title: Motorcycle_sensors
item.description: Background My dad is rebuilding a 1929 Indian Scout motorcycle. The problem is that it has no speedometer, odometer, or temperature guages and I need to build them. Basics I’m using a Metro Mini 328 as the brains. And a METRO 328 for building. The full size is nice because I have a couple each mounted to a breadboard and one with an oled display.
